Role¶

class app.roles.role.Role(**kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: flask_sqlalchemy.Model, flask_security.core.RoleMixin

The user role data model.

User roles are defined when the application is initialized. To add additional roles, insert them into the database from the app.create_app() function using the user_datastore.create_role() function.

description¶

Short description of the role.

id¶

Generated id for the role.

name¶

The name of the role. This attribute is used when checking for user roles using the @role_required decorator.
